item.title: 1. Introduction To Probability.
item.description: In this post I will be explaining the very basic concept of probability. Many might be very familiar with the topic but it can be a good refresher and reference for the upcoming posts that talks about more specific topics (random variables, inequalities, etc..).

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Ali Alorainy Living between tech and science. passionate about building products, intelligent ones. Leading Malaa and exploring market making, risk management, monetary policy and data driven decisions. This is my free area where i write about random things i find interesting in data science, engineering, startups, management, finance, photography and music. Here is a list of when you should reach out: Interested in R&D work within the financial sector.
